display_long_description: Welcome to a jungle different from all others, where evolution took a surprising turn and the monkeys have no legs—but that’s never stopped them before. In Legless Monkeys, you’ll be leading a band of wily, wheel-bound primates as they sling, slide, and launch themselves through a world of banana-fueled madness. With precision timing, you’ll make them swing; you’ll cause them to master the use of momentum; and you’ll have them defy gravity in stunts that would make a real-life primate envious. Dodging their deaths by jungle traps, rival animals, or the occasionally puzzled zookeeper, these brave behavior hackers will uncover the ancient secret of the Missing Limbs in multiplayer mayhem or solo story mode. Agile, unpredictable, and outrageously fun—Legless Monkeys shows that you don’t need legs to kick butt.
